sourcesContent:
import React,{ useEffect, useState} from 'react' import { Table,Checkbox,Button} from 'semantic-ui-react'; import '../App.css' const ShowRequest=(props)=> { const initialInfo=async()=>{ let f=await props.contract.methods.getreqNo().call() console.log(f) const info = await Promise.all( new Array(f).fill().map(()=> new Array(6) .fill() .map((element, index) => { return props.contract.methods.getRequeststatus(index).call(); }) ) ) console.table(info); } useEffect(async()=>{ initialInfo() },[props.refresh]) return (
Request_NO Creator Description: Amount: Recipient: Voters/Donors Payment Completed {/* { data.map((e,index)=>( {index} {e.data[0]} {e.data[1]} {e.data[2]} {e.data[3]} {e.data[4]}/{e.data[5]} {e.data[6]} )) } */} {/* {Requests.map((request,index) => ( {index} {cAddress} {description} {amount} {recipient} {voters}/{donors} {completed} ) )} */}
) } export default ShowRequest
